e.name: alpha1ext
e.source: Obtained from PDB 1kx5, symmetrized over two copies of the histone.

1.name: alpha1
1.description: Alpha1-helix. First helix of the histone fold.
1.source: Obtained from PDB 1kx5, symmetrized over two copies of the histone.

l.name: loopL1
l.description: L1 loop. Loop connecting first and second helices of the histone fold. Part of the L1L2 DNA bining site formed by H2A and H2B at SHL ±3.5.
l.source: Obtained from PDB 1kx5, symmetrized over two copies of the histone.

2.name: alpha2
2.description: Alpha2-helix. Second helix of the histone fold.
2.source: Obtained from PDB 1kx5, symmetrized over two copies of the histone.

L.name: loopL2
L.description: L2 loop. Loop connecting second and third helices of the histone fold. Part of the L1L2 DNA bining site formed by H2A and H2B at SHL ±5.5.
L.source: Obtained from PDB 1kx5, symmetrized over two copies of the histone.

3.name: alpha3
3.description: Alpha3-helix. Third helix of the histone fold.
3.source: Obtained from PDB 1kx5, symmetrized over two copies of the histone.

E.name: alpha3ext
E.source: Obtained from PDB 1kx5, symmetrized over two copies of the histone.

b.name: beta1
b.description: short beta-sheet in the L1L2 DNA bining site.
b.source: Obtained from PDB 1kx5, symmetrized over two copies of the histone.

B.name: beta2
B.description: short beta-sheet in the L1L2 DNA bining site.
B.source: Obtained from PDB 1kx5, symmetrized over two copies of the histone.

q.name: beta3
q.description: short beta-sheet between H2A and H4.
q.source: Obtained from PDB 1kx5, symmetrized over two copies of the histone.

D.name: Docking domain
D.description: Docking domain locks the H2A-H2B dimer on the H3-H4 tetramer surface.
D.source: Obtained from PDB 1kx5, symmetrized over two copies of the histone.

a.name: mgArg1
a.description: Position of minor groove arginine at the L1L2 DNA bining site at SHL ±3.5.
a.source: Obtained from PDB 1kx5, symmetrized over two copies of the histone.

A.name: mgArg2
A.description: Position of minor groove arginine at the L1L2 DNA bining site at SHL ±5.5.
A.source: Obtained from PDB 1kx5, symmetrized over two copies of the histone.

p.name: ap
p.source: Obtained from PDB 1kx5, symmetrized over two copies of the histone

X.name: H2A.X-motif
X.description: H2A.X has the SQE/DΦ motif at C-terminus, where Φ-represents a hydrophobic residue, usually Tyr in mammals.

p.name: p
p.description: The C-terminal serine can be phosphorylated in H2A.X-containing nucleosomes at the DNA double strand breaks.

R.name: ARG-run
R.description: Run of arginines characteristic of H2A.B at least in human.

Z.name: X>D
Z.description: Site of characteristic X>D substitution in many H2A.Z (excl. Trypanosoma), which enlarges acidic patch. DEELD motif is usually characteristic of H2A.Z.

i.name: IN
i.description: Site of characteristic one amino acid insertion with respect to canonical H2A in L1-loop.

d.name: DEL
d.description: Site of characteristic one amino acid deletion with respect to canonical H2A.

M.name: macro domain
M.description: Non-histone macro domain, which can bind ADP-ribose.

C.name: alphaC
C.source: Obtained from PDB 1kx5, symmetrized over two copies of the histone
